component.name: MainScene
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/rsgde_bg_hd.jpg"
m.readListTask = createObject("roSGNode", "DownloadListReader") m.readListTask.observeField("downloadList", "showDownloadList") m.readListTask.downloadsUri = "https://BASE_DOMAIN/api/downloads" m.readListTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub showDownloadList() labelList = m.top.findNode("downloadLabelList") labelList.content = m.readListTask.downloadList
rect = labelList.boundingRect() centerX = (1280 - rect.width) / 2 centerY = (720 - rect.height) / 2 labelList.translation = [centerX, centerX]
m.top.setFocus(true) end sub
